name: Dark Forest (itch) (FakeBoss)
description:
Dark Forest is a First-Person-Shooter Arena placed in a Forest with endless waves of monsters.

This is not a big company experience with hours and hours of content. What we’d like to offer you is a simple game that challenges you to survive and compete with people all around the world for the highest score or merely to unwind and unstress killing monsters using magic.

Game Features:
  • Face 12 Different Monsters.
  • 3 different skills to use as you wish.
  • Submit score to compete on global leaderboard.
  • Multiplayer incoming
